definition: to a moderately sufficient extent or degree, full of or showing high-spirited merriment, a yawl used by a ship's sailors for general work, to be silly or tease one another
details:
adverb
- to a moderately sufficient extent or degree
= example: to a moderately sufficient extent or degree
= synonyms: middling
adjective
- full of or showing high-spirited merriment
= example: full of or showing high-spirited merriment
= synonyms: merry
noun
- a yawl used by a ship's sailors for general work
= synonyms: jolly boat
- a happy party
= example: a happy party
verb
- to be silly or tease one another
= example: to be silly or tease one another
= synonyms: kid
